tweet:

alt_tweet:

pollinations is now a full multi-modal studio.

no subscriptions, just code. link in bio.
image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the cute chubby bee mascot in a retro recording studio. Bee is wearing headphones, adjusting a large pixelated mixing board with a video camera and microphone nearby. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel purple gradient background. 'ON AIR' sign in pixel font. Warm lighting, lo-fi aesthetic like Stardew Valley. Dynamic, excited vibe.
reasoning: Highlights the massive expansion of capabilities (Video/Audio/Text) in a concise, builder-focused way. Encourages immediate action ('go build').
